Localization.Name: Emod "Tweaker" Stabilizer2
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: ArmaMod
Type: Energy Stabilizer
Attachment Point: Barrel
Size: 2

Heat: -80%
Aim Recoil: +40%
Visual Recoil: -15%
Damage: +12.5%
Ammo Consumption: +100%

ArmaMod designed the Emod Stabilizer2 attachment to improve heat distribution and visual stability allowing for a more precise shot. This "Tweaker" version has been unofficially modified to do more damage at the cost of expending more energy.
